author: Anonymous Gear
title: problem set SPD Handin issue
question: I keep getting an error message saying I have non-textual elements but I didn't add or change anything besides my own code and I didn't add any comment boxes or pasted images, how do I fix this?
instructor_answer:
did you use comment boxes? or copy in any images?
Or copy any text from the results window to the definitions window?  Sometimes when you copy numbers from the definitions window into the editor window you get this problem.
